name: twitter-oracle
description: Testing set up for Oraclize's computation resource url-requests
author: Jackson Virgo

scripts.ganache:dev: ganache-cli -i 11 -p 8545 -m 'nerve marine frozen use brave brief nasty then acid remain stereo riot'
scripts.ganache:test: ganache-cli -i 10 -p 9545 -m 'nerve marine frozen use brave brief nasty then acid remain stereo riot'
scripts.ganache:client: ganache-cli -i 12 -p 8545 --blockTime 1 -m 'nerve marine frozen use brave brief nasty then acid remain stereo riot'
scripts.ganache:slow: ganache-cli -i 12 -p 8545 --blockTime 3 -m 'nerve marine frozen use brave brief nasty then acid remain stereo riot'
